text_section1.text: It seemed that no walls could withstand...

text_section2.text: The Strange Power of Gary Ford

text_section3.text: This is what I call a first-rate break! Funny, though there's no mention on the map of a city located at this point of the Sahara!

text_section1.text: Hot, thirsty and wearied by the sun burning down on the endless desert waste, the adventure drove into the market place and drank his fill...
They're beckoning me to follow them! Well, why not? They seem friendly!
It was while he was exploring the fabulous city's beauty, that Gary Ford made a startling discovery...

text_section2.text: I'm walking right through the wall of the building!

text_section1.text: He passed through several more walls before suspecting the answer to his sudden power...

text_section2.text: It can only have been caused by the water I drank from that fountain!

text_section1.text: Apparently the water has no effect on the natives because they're used to drinking it!
This must be their shiek's palace!
Led at once to the presence of sheik Abdul Ranah, Gary Ford walked through the pillars to show off his power...
We bid you welcome, my daughter and I! You will do us honor to accept our hospitality!

text_section2.text: Looks as if my little act has impressed him plenty!

text_section1.text: Gary saw that the sheik's daughter was attractive! And he saw something else...

text_section2.text: Chests full of gems!

text_section1.text: As time went on Gary pretended to be in love with sheik Abdul's daughter that he might be welcome at the palace even longer...

text_section2.text: Some day I may be able to prove myself worthy of you, Sira!

text_section3.text: Your love is enough proof for me, Gary!

text_section1.text: But soon he met a servant girl in the great palace - an outsider like himself.

text_section2.text: A red headed Arabian girl!

text_section1.text: A yank girl! And red is my favorite color! Honey, you and I are going to be great friends!

text_section2.text: Local gossip has it you and his nibs' daughter are like that! I just work here, Mr. Ford! If I so much as smile at you I'll be in for trouble!

text_section1.text: In spite of herself, Joyce Flynn quickly fell in love with Gary, and he with her...

text_section2.text: Gary, I'm afraid of what may happen if Sira finds out. What can we do?

text_section3.text: Leave here two very rich people, if you're game!

text_section1.text: Sheik Abdul's gems could keep us in luxury for the rest of our lives, Joyce!

text_section2.text: Steal, Gary! Is that the only way there is for us?

text_section1.text: A few nights later Gary and Joyce filled his knapsack with gems and fled the palace...

text_section2.text: Sound the alarm! They're making off with Abdul's treasure!

text_section3.text: We'll have to make a run for it, Joyce!

text_section1.text: Quickly, Joyce, around the corner! We've got to separate! I'll lead them after me while you escape!

text_section2.text: No, Gary!

text_section1.text: Don't argue! Find a horse and ride eastward to Cairo! I'll meet you there within two days!

text_section2.text: I have the horse I came here on! But what if they catch you?

text_section1.text: They can't can't catch me, Joyce! I have the power to avoid them!

text_section2.text: Be careful, Darling! I'll be waiting for you!

text_section1.text: Gary Ford headed for the market place where his motorcycle still stood! He dashed through building walls to escape his pursuers...
Made it! Now, baby, let's see 'em catch us!
Then, as he was about to ride away...

text_section2.text: The sheik... his troops! They've vanished! And now the buildings are starting to disappear!

text_section1.text: One by one buildings faded into nothingnes...

text_section2.text: Even the fountain is gone! Just a small oasis in it's place!

text_section1.text: Until the city and its cobbled streets were gone! The startled eyes of Gary Ford beheld only dunes, and palms and desert waste...

text_section2.text: No wonder I could walk through the walls! They were never there... it was all a mirage!

text_section1.text: The gems... they're nothing but sand! I talked with people, but I heard them only because I believed they really existed!
... and Joyce! Then she was an illusion, too!
As Gary Ford sped westward away from Cairo, he thought not of gems he'd never have...

text_section2.text: Riches don't seem important now! If only Joyce had been real! How good life would have been, married to a girl like her!

text_section1.text: Someone else had witnessed the disappearance of the fabulous desert city...

text_section2.text: I never wanted gems! Nothing would have mattered if only Gary hadn't been just another mirage!

text_section1.text: Joyce Flynn urged her horse eastward toward Cairo, away from the love she'd never see again...

text_section2.text: My life would be complete if I could have married a man like that!
